tha-ap425:8.1: Na me deyyadhammo atthi → na me deyyaṃ tava atthi (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed); na me deyyaṃ tavam atthi (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap425:10.1: Vissattho → vissaṭṭho (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1, mr); visaṭṭho (csp1ed)
tha-ap425:10.4: paripūrissatināgate → paripūrissatanāgate (bj); paripūressatāsanaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); paripūressati'nāgate (pts-vp-pli1); paripūrissatāsanaṃ (mr)
